headline: Seagate Files Multi Billion Shelf As HAMR Growth And AI Demand Build
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings filed a multi billion dollar shelf registration covering more than 14 million ordinary shares. The filing follows record financial results and ongoing deployment of the company’s HAMR storage technology. The shelf registration could be used for future equity issuance or capital raising, subject to market conditions and company decisions. For investors following NasdaqGS:STX, this filing lands at a time when the stock is priced at $407.69 and has delivered very...
